attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordan Brown is not our elected Prime Minister, he is only the elected leader of the Labour Party. Since he bottled the decision for an early election last year, we've had a run on a bank, and a failure to give the people a say in a referendum. Lets end this period of incompetence and create a consensus for a general election!

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Decision2008/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
